text: ks̄ʹạtriy̒ trạs̄ ẁā reụ̄̀xngrāw k̄hxng phwk ṭhex pĕn chèn rị meụ̄̀x phwk ṭhex yạ̀w ywn yū suf phwk nāng kl̀āw ẁā k̄hx xạllxḥ̒ thrng khûmkhrxng reā mị̀rū̂ mā k̀xn ley ẁā k̄heā thả chạ̀w p̣hriyā k̄hxng p̄hū̂ ẁā‡ kl̀āw ẁā bạdnī̂ khwām cring dị̂ prākt̩ k̄hụ̂n læ̂w c̄hạn dị̂ yạ̀wywn k̄heā læa thæ̂cring k̄heā khụ̄x p̄hū̂ h̄nụ̀ng nı h̄mū̀ p̄hū̂ s̄ạty̒ cring xỳāng næ̀nxn
